creator: jaBernet@gmx.ch
text:
Currently if compression is on and a Servlet generates a page with
content-length set, the output will be sent using chunked-encoding. IMO it would
be better if in that case the content should be gzipped as a whole and then sent
with the new content-length set and without chunking.

creator: julian.reschke@gmx.de
text:
Seems like a Very Bad Idea, because you wouldn't be able to stream the response
while compressing.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The size after compression isn't going to be the one specified, and it is not
possible to determine the output size (except in the case where it's one chunk
long, but it's rather complex to determine for almost no gain).
